name: Yummy Memory
description:
A game that will train your memory. You must memorize several pairs of images to successfully pass the different levels. The whole game design is cute with a kawaii style !

Have fun raising challenges such as limited time or card movements during the game !

Features:
- 30 kawaii levels
- Card packs with food, ice cream, fruits and vegetables
- Periodic updating of game content (new levels are coming soon !)
- Simple and cute interface
